title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 12 May 2008 - XWiki
content: xwikibot - (12/05/2008 09:12): XWiki.Vinod was modified by XWiki.Vinod (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Vinod xwikibot - (12/05/2008 11:28): Macros.IframeNavigationMacro was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasEveilleau - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/IframeNavigationMacro xwikibot - (12/05/2008 14:01): Macros.RequestStructuredDocumentsMacro was modified by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasEveilleau - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/RequestStructuredDocumentsMacro xwikibot - (12/05/2008 15:11): XWiki.StevenKett was modified by XWiki.StevenKett (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/StevenKett xwikibot - (12/05/2008 15:16): XWiki.StevenKett was modified by XWiki.StevenKett - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/StevenKett xwikibot - (12/05/2008 15:17): XWiki.StevenKett was modified by XWiki.StevenKett - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/StevenKett jaydee\_p - (12/05/2008 15:59): Hi folks... anybody able to deploy the docTree plugin? jaydee\_p - (12/05/2008 16:00): I'm getting "java.util.zip.ZipException: invalid entry size (expected 1538260992 but got 25 bytes)" daning - (12/05/2008 18:04): hi. Would you mind if I ask which java servlet container xwiki.org use? vmassol - (12/05/2008 18:05): daning: hi, tomcat daning - (12/05/2008 18:06): vmassol: I see xwiki.org use mailman as maillist tool. Do mailman run in tomcat or apache2 in xwiki.org? vmassol - (12/05/2008 18:06): mailman doesn't run in a servlet container vmassol - (12/05/2008 18:06): it's a server in itself daning - (12/05/2008 18:08): mailman web pages like http://dev.xwiki.org/mailman/listinfo run in itself? vmassol - (12/05/2008 18:09): daning: this url doesn't exist daning - (12/05/2008 18:10): sorry. see this page http://lists.xwiki.org/mailman/listinfo vmassol - (12/05/2008 18:11): yes it runs on itself sdumitriu - (12/05/2008 19:12): news xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12): Last 5 pages modified: xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12):   \* IRC.xwikiArchive20080512 - http://dev.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/IRC/xwikiArchive20080512, by XWiki.XWikiGuest xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12):   \* XWiki.StevenKett - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/StevenKett, by XWiki.StevenKett xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12):   \* Macros.RequestStructuredDocumentsMacro - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/RequestStructuredDocumentsMacro, by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasEveilleau (Upload new image requestresult.png) xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12):   \* Macros.IframeNavigationMacro - http://code.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Macros/IframeNavigationMacro, by xwiki:XWiki.ThomasEveilleau (Upload new image iframeplusresult.png) xwikibot - (12/05/2008 19:12):   \* XWiki.Vinod - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/Vinod, by XWiki.Vinod (Created user) xwikibot - (12/05/2008 21:55): XWiki.BerniH was modified by XWiki.BerniH (Created user) - http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/XWiki/BerniH
